mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_visa ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, code, handling_date, user_id, state, commission_state, kj_approval_date, receive_type_id, receive_date, service_id, service_order_id, installment_num, installment, payment_voucher_image_url_1, payment_voucher_image_url_2, payment_voucher_image_url_3, payment_voucher_image_url_4, payment_voucher_image_url_5, visa_voucher_image_url, receivable, received, per_amount, amount, expect_amount, sure_expect_amount, discount, gst, deduct_gst, bonus, bonus_date, adviser_id, mara_id, official_id, bank_check, is_checked, remarks, is_close) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{code}, #{handlingDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId}, #{state}, 'DJY', NULL, #{receiveTypeId}, #{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serviceId}, #{serviceOrderId}, #{installmentNum}, #{installment}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl1}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl2}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl3}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl4}, #{paymentVoucherImageUrl5}, #{visaVoucherImageUrl}, #{receivable}, #{received}, #{perAmount}, #{amount}, #{expectAmount}, #{sureExpectAmount}, #{discount}, #{gst}, #{deductGst}, #{bonus}, #{bonusDate}, #{adviserId}, #{maraId}, #{officialId}, NULL, 0, #{remarks}, 0);

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, code, handling_date AS handlingDate, user_id AS userId, state, commission_state AS commissionState, kj_approval_date AS kjApprovalDate, receive_type_id AS receiveTypeId, receive_date AS receiveDate, service_id AS serviceId, service_order_id AS serviceOrderId, installment_num AS installmentNum, installment, payment_voucher_image_url_1 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl1, payment_voucher_image_url_2 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl2, payment_voucher_image_url_3 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl3, payment_voucher_image_url_4 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl4, payment_voucher_image_url_5 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl5, visa_voucher_image_url AS visaVoucherImageUrl, receivable, received, per_amount AS perAmount, amount, expect_amount AS expectAmount, sure_expect_amount AS sureExpectAmount, discount, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, bonus, bonus_date AS bonusDate, adviser_id AS adviserId, mara_id AS maraId, official_id AS officialId, bank_check AS bankCheck, is_checked AS isChecked, remarks, is_close AS isClose FROM b_visa WHERE service_order_id = #{serviceOrderId};

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(v.receive_date, '%Y-%m') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(v.receive_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(v.kj_approval_date, '%Y-%m') AS date,
DATE_FORMAT(v.kj_approval_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
r.id AS regionId, r.name AS area, a.id AS adviserId, a.name AS consultant, SUM(v.bonus) AS commission, SUM(IFNULL(v.sure_expect_amount, 0)) AS serviceFee FROM b_visa v, tb_adviser a, tb_region r WHERE a.region_id = r.id AND v.adviser_id = a.id
AND v.kj_approval_date > #{startDate} AND v.kj_approval_date < #{endDate}
AND r.id = #{regionId}
AND a.id = #{adviserId}
GROUP BY
DATE_FORMAT(v.receive_date, '%Y-%m'),
DATE_FORMAT(v.receive_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),
DATE_FORMAT(v.kj_approval_date, '%Y-%m'),
DATE_FORMAT(v.kj_approval_date, '%Y-%m-%d'),
adviser_id ORDER BY v.kj_approval_date DESC;

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, code, handling_date AS handlingDate, user_id AS userId, state, commission_state AS commissionState, kj_approval_date AS kjApprovalDate, receive_type_id AS receiveTypeId, receive_date AS receiveDate, service_id AS serviceId, service_order_id AS serviceOrderId, installment_num AS installmentNum, installment, payment_voucher_image_url_1 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl1, payment_voucher_image_url_2 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl2, payment_voucher_image_url_3 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl3, payment_voucher_image_url_4 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl4, payment_voucher_image_url_5 AS paymentVoucherImageUrl5, visa_voucher_image_url AS visaVoucherImageUrl, receivable, received, per_amount AS perAmount, amount, expect_amount AS expectAmount, sure_expect_amount AS sureExpectAmount, discount, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, bonus, bonus_date AS bonusDate, adviser_id AS adviserId, mara_id AS maraId, official_id AS officialId, bank_check AS bankCheck, is_checked AS isChecked, remarks, is_close AS isClose FROM b_visa WHERE installment_num = 1 AND service_order_id = #{serviceOrderId};
select IFNULL(sum(bonus), 0.00) from b_visa where DATE_FORMAT(gmt_create, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') and is_close = 0;
